description: Young and straight lads Marco Braid and Dominic Moore joined me by the seaside for a mini holiday and to have some fun shooting. These two are mates and get along really well. After a fun day out at the rides together the duo came back to the beach house where they couldn’t keep their hands off each other! Marco has Dominic stripped in minutes and the pair let loose on each other!
title: Young Straight Lad Marco Braid's 1st Ever Man Suck & it's Dominic's Huge Uncut Cock he Blows!
